name: Oracle Sites
description: Sacred locations where divine prophecy and spiritual insight can be obtained provide guidance and foresight. The prophetic nature provides valuable information and spiritual guidance, while the divine connection attracts both seekers of truth and those who would manipulate the prophecies.
atmosphere: Divine whispers echo through sacred halls like distant thunder. The air carries the sweet scent of incense and divine energy. Prophetic visions shimmer in the air like heat mirages. Sacred symbols and divination tools cover every surface. Your mind feels expanded, thoughts flowing like water. A profound sense of being watched by something vast and ancient.
